lead_paragraph: The 16-year-old Jozy Altidore scored his first goal in his second Major League Soccer game, giving the Red Bulls a 1-0 victory last night over the visiting Columbus Crew. He entered in the 74th minute and scored in the 83rd with a 28-yard blast through the hands of goalkeeper Bill Gaudette.
